#summary A quick guide on how to create physics entities in maps.

= Instructions =
  # In GtkRadiant, create a func_physics entity.
  # Press n to bring up the Entity Properties window.
  # Change the _shape_ key to fit the physics object. Only use the _custom_ shape if no other shape fits your object.

  The table below shows the available shapes:

|| *Number* || *Associated Shape ||
|| 0 || Cuboid (all objects are cuboids by default) ||
|| 1 || Sphere ||
|| 2 || Cylinder ||
|| 3 || Capsule ||
|| 4 || Custom shape ||
